title: About Us
meta_content: Through the internal links on this page one can find our core beliefs and history
content:
What We Believe

We believe that the Bible is the inspired Word of God Equally in all parts and without error in its original manuscript, absolutely infallible, and our source of supreme revelation from God, superior to conscience and reason, though not contrary to reason; and it is therefore our infallible rule of faith and practice. (II Timothy 3:16-17; I Peter 1:23-25; Hebrews 4:12.)

Our History

Page coming soon

Our Vision

To build a T.E.M.P.L.E. of the Living God among the people: To TEACH and preach Jesus Christ though the uncompromising Word of God. To EVANGELIZE families, our community, country, and the world.

Service Times

All are welcome; come as you are and join us for either our normal worship and prayer services or for any of our special events!

Prophetic Words

Prophecy in it's most basic form is a God inspired statement in a known language. A prophecy from God edifies, exorts and confirms the plans and purposes that the Holy Ghost has put in someone's heart. The following prophecies have been spoken over Pastors Tom and Stella and the local church at various times in their ministry.
